items.title: Develop sales strategies
items.description: Create comprehensive sales plans and approaches to achieve revenue targets and market goals.

items.title: Manage sales team
items.description: Lead, motivate, and coordinate sales representatives to maximize team performance and results.

items.title: Track sales performance metrics
items.description: Monitor KPIs, conversion rates, and revenue data to measure team and individual performance.

items.title: Conduct client meetings
items.description: Meet with prospects and existing customers to build relationships and close deals.

items.title: Negotiate contracts and deals
items.description: Discuss terms, pricing, and agreements with clients to secure profitable business arrangements.

items.title: Analyze market opportunities
items.description: Research target markets and identify new business opportunities for revenue growth.

items.title: Train sales representatives
items.description: Provide coaching, product knowledge, and sales technique training to team members.

items.title: Manage sales pipeline
items.description: Oversee lead qualification, opportunity progression, and deal forecasting processes.

items.title: Generate sales reports
items.description: Create regular reports on team performance, revenue trends, and market activities.

items.title: Coordinate with marketing
items.description: Collaborate with marketing team to align lead generation and promotional activities.

items.title: Set sales quotas
items.description: Establish realistic yet challenging revenue targets for individual team members and territories.

items.title: Conduct territory planning
items.description: Analyze and assign geographic or market territories to optimize coverage and performance.

items.title: Handle customer escalations
items.description: Resolve complex customer issues and complaints that require managerial intervention.

items.title: Forecast sales revenue
items.description: Predict future sales performance based on pipeline data and market trends.

items.title: Recruit sales talent
items.description: Interview, evaluate, and hire new sales representatives to build team capacity.

items.title: Develop pricing strategies
items.description: Create competitive pricing models and discount structures to maximize profitability.

items.title: Monitor competitor activities
items.description: Track competitive landscape and adjust sales strategies based on market dynamics.

items.title: Schedule team meetings
items.description: Organize regular sales meetings, one-on-ones, and performance reviews with team members.

items.title: Manage key customer relationships
items.description: Maintain strategic relationships with high-value clients and key business partners.

items.title: Optimize sales processes
items.description: Streamline sales workflows, reduce friction, and improve conversion efficiency.

items.title: Present to executives
items.description: Deliver sales performance updates and strategic recommendations to senior leadership.

items.title: Manage sales budget
items.description: Allocate and control departmental spending on tools, training, and promotional activities.
